text:
@RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump We pay Mark, but he is at Trump's command.
45 used his #TrumpPressBriefing to divide the nation and direct anger at Democrats to distract from his tragic mishandling of the #coronavirus crisis. 
Mark fell RIGHT in line.
#GOPBetrayedAmerica
